Question
========

In a sample of Dutch employees with a burnout, the stress level is measured based on the number of nanograms of cortisol per milliliter in the saliva. What level of measurement does the measured variable have?

Answerlist
----------
* Dichotomous
* Ordinal
* Quantitative
* Discrete

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
